http.name: HTTP Endpoint
http.description: Configure HTTP endpoint to send requests

fields.label: Target Label
fields.placeholder: Enter a descriptive name for this target
fields.description: A descriptive name for this target

fields.label: URL
fields.description: The HTTP endpoint URL to send requests to

fields.label: HTTP Method
fields.description: HTTP request method

fields.label: Headers
fields.description: HTTP headers in JSON format

fields.label: Request Body
fields.description: Request body template. Use {{prompt}} for the test input

fields.label: Response Parser
fields.description: JSONPath or JavaScript expression to extract the response (optional)

fields.label: Timeout (ms)
fields.description: Request timeout in milliseconds

fields.label: Target Label
fields.placeholder: Enter a descriptive name for this target
fields.description: A descriptive name for this target

fields.label: WebSocket URL
fields.description: The WebSocket endpoint URL

fields.label: Message Template
fields.description: Message template to send. Use {{prompt}} for the test input

fields.label: Response Parser
fields.description: Expression to extract the response from WebSocket message

fields.label: Timeout (ms)
fields.description: Request timeout in milliseconds

foundation_model.name: Foundation Model
foundation_model.description: Configure foundation models like OpenAI, Anthropic, etc.

fields.label: Target Label
fields.placeholder: Enter a descriptive name for this target
fields.description: A descriptive name for this target

fields.label: Model
fields.description: Model identifier

fields.label: API Key
fields.placeholder: Enter API key or leave empty to use environment variable
fields.description: API key. If not set, will use environment variable (e.g., OPENAI_API_KEY)

fields.label: API Base URL
fields.description: Custom API base URL. Leave empty to use the default endpoint

fields.label: Timeout (ms)
fields.description: Request timeout in milliseconds (default: 60000ms = 1 minute)

fields.label: Temperature
fields.description: Controls randomness. Lower = more deterministic, Higher = more creative

fields.label: Max Tokens
fields.description: Maximum number of tokens in the response

fields.label: Deployment Name
fields.description: Azure OpenAI deployment name (Azure only)

fields.label: AWS Region
fields.description: AWS region (Bedrock only)

fields.label: Target Label
fields.placeholder: Enter a descriptive name for this target
fields.description: A descriptive name for this target

fields.label: Dify Endpoint Type
fields.description: Chat Messages for conversational apps, Workflow for workflow execution

fields.label: API Base URL
fields.description: Dify API base URL. Leave empty to use default or DIFY_API_BASE env var

fields.label: API Key
fields.description: Dify API key. If not set, will use DIFY_API_KEY environment variable

fields.label: User ID
fields.description: User identifier for the conversation

fields.label: Conversation ID
fields.placeholder: Leave empty to start a new conversation
fields.description: Leave empty to start a new conversation, or provide an existing conversation ID

fields.label: Custom Inputs
fields.description: Custom inputs that will be passed to the Dify app/workflow (JSON format)

fields.label: Timeout (ms)
fields.description: Request timeout in milliseconds

fields.label: Target Label
fields.placeholder: Enter a descriptive name for this target
fields.description: A descriptive name for this target

fields.label: Coze Region
fields.description: Select the Coze API region

fields.label: Bot ID
fields.description: Required. Your Coze bot ID from the Coze platform

fields.label: API Base URL
fields.description: Coze API base URL. Leave empty to use default based on region

fields.label: API Key
fields.description: Coze API key. If not set, will use COZE_API_KEY environment variable

fields.label: User ID
fields.description: User identifier for the conversation

fields.label: Conversation ID
fields.placeholder: Leave empty to start a new conversation
fields.description: Leave empty to start a new conversation, or provide an existing conversation ID

fields.label: Timeout (ms)
fields.description: Request timeout in milliseconds (default: 120000ms = 2 minutes)

common.name: Common Configuration
common.description: Common configuration options for all provider types

fields.label: Delay (ms)
fields.description: Delay between requests in milliseconds to simulate a real user
